transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Hi, good morning sir. Sanya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji madam, badhiya naam hai.
Executive: Sir, kal aapka call aaya tha but miss ho gayi thi call kyunki main leave pe thi sir kal.
Customer: Haan, wo maine ek product add kiya tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Lekin wo show nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Catalog mein add kiya tha sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second sir, main check kar le rahi hu. Line par hi rahiyega.
Customer: Do kiya tha, ek hi hua, ek nahi hua hai.
Executive: Ek show nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Haan. Catalog mein show nahi ho raha hai ya phir inactive hai? Main check kar le rahi hu sir.
Customer: Inactive bhi nahi hai, catalog mein nahi dikh raha.
Executive: Kya naam tha sir product ka?
Customer: Caterpillar.
Executive: Okay. Sir, ek ye aapka inactive mein dikh raha hai. 625 kva caterpillar diesel generator. Iski baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji wahi.
Executive: Okay, okay. Sir isme price likhenge aap? Mujhe uska price batayenge kya?
Customer: 24 lakhs.
Executive: 24 lakhs?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Lekin usme price nahi dalna hai mujhe.
Executive: Achha aapko price nahi dalna hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: fluctuating rehta hai, thoda bahut upar niche rehta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir ye ye band auto rejected mein dikha raha hai. Ek second line par hi rahiye sir. Ek second sir line par hi rahiye main bata rahi hu aapko. Ye band product mein dikha raha hai.
Customer: Haan ji. Band mein kyun dikha raha hai?
Executive: Haan sir wahi main bol rahi hu. Ek second aap line par rahiye main dekh kar bata rahi hu aapko. Kyun aa raha hai ye aisa. Ji ji aap phone mat cut kariyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Caterpillar diesel generator.
Executive: Aisa kuch hai. Sir aapne jo picture lagai hai ye sahi picture hai na sir isi ki hai na?
Customer: Haan isi ki hai.
Executive: Isi ki picture lagai hai aapne?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir ek minute main wapas add karke dekhti hu.
Customer: Theek hai. Sir RPM wala bhi kuch hota hai isme? Kuch RPM bhi add karna padta hai apne ko?
Customer: 1500, 1500 RPM hai isme.
Executive: 1500?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: 1500 RPM.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aur sir iski category kya rahegi? Cat diesel generator aur
Customer: Haan cat cat.
Executive: Cat diesel generator ek hi rahega sir? 3412, cat 3412.
Customer: Cat 3412.
Customer: Haan ji, wo model hai.
Executive: Aur aapne bola ki aapko price nahi dalna hai, right?
Customer: Haan, price nahi dalna hai isme.
Executive: Price isme nahi add karna hai aapko. Price hatayenge kaise?
Executive: Nahi hat raha.
Executive: Price nahi dala sir maine, theek hai?
Executive: Sir thoda sa description?
Customer: Kya chahiye usme?
Executive: Sir description mein basically na hum product ke bare mein thoda sa dalte hai ya wo uska usage dal dete hai, uske koi feature dal dete hai aisa. To aap ye apne man se google se
Customer: Nahi nahi google se dalna padta hai. Ye 625 hai kva RPM 1500 likh do description mein.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai? Aur running hour approx 4000 likh do.
Executive: Sir dekhiye yaha pe jo pada hua hai pehle main wo bata deti hu phir aage kya likhna hai aap mujhe ek ek karke batana to main on screen abhi likhti jaungi, right?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan sir abhi yaha pe likha hua hai cat 3412
Customer: Haan.
Executive: And then 625 caterpillar generator. Itna sahi hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay, aage kya add karna hai sir isme?
Customer: Isme yahi isliye dalna padega ki kitna kva hai means 625 kva hai, RPM 1500 hai aur running hour 4100 hai.
Executive: 625 kva.
Customer: RPM 1500.
Executive: Aur RPM 1500 wapas dalna hai.
Customer: Aur running running hour.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 4100 approx.
Executive: 4000 approx, 4000 minutes approx.
Customer: Haan 4000 approx.
Executive: Okay. Sir specification use use generator use generator in good condition ye bhi likh do sath mein.
Executive: Okay sir abhi wo main add kar deti hu. Aur sir ye kya bol rahe hai kya dalna hai?
Customer: Use generator in good condition.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Well maintain likh do sath mein.
Executive: Use generator in good condition, right?
Customer: Haan comma karke well maintain.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ji. Aur kuch dalna hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi bas.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur sir ye power mein bhi kya dalna hai? Specification jo other details mein mara aata hai na additional details.
Customer: Power mein 625 hi rahega kva.
Executive: 625 wo likh diya na. Haan kva.
Executive: Okay. Ab main dekhti hu ye active ho raha hai ya nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir ye na maine sari details to add kar di hai but abhi still ye same issue yaha pe mujhe dikha raha hai auto rejected ka. To ek bar main check kar lu discuss karke main aapko.
Customer: Theek hai mujhe lag raha hai ye
Executive: Ye caterpillar aisa issue nahi hai name ka.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir name ka issue nahi hai ye auto rejected dikha raha hai. Sir aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye main ek bar discuss karti hu dekhti hu kyun aisa ho raha hai main aapko update karti hu phir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay, okay sir. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Product added is not showing in catalog.

- Wants to remove price from the product.

- Product is showing in band auto rejected.



Resolution:

- Executive is adding the product details.

- Executive added product details and description.

- Executive informed will check and update.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will check and update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product, description, auto rejected
